p: The sensitivity and specificity of the Elecsys Â® Zika IgG assay were determined using a testing algorithm: the comparator serologic test, followed by further resolution of any discrepant samples using blocking experiments (using Zika/Dengue full length NS1 protein) and/or the recomLINE Tropical Fever IgG immunoblot assay (MIKROGEN GmbH, Neuried, Germany; Figure 1) [ 19]. The testing algorithm provided a surrogate standard for assessing diagnostic performance. Diagnostic specificity, diagnostic sensitivity, and confidence intervals ((CI) 95%, two-sided) were calculated using a validated statistical analysis system (SAS) tool (developed by Biostatistics, Roche Diagnostics GmbH).
